name: Senescence
description:
Senescence is a narrative puzzle platformer made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The player must traverse the same level while dealing with progressively losing control of the character due to aging.

Credits:

  • Omna Toshniwal: Character design, animation, and art assets.
  • Pedro Poblete Lasserre: Art assets and narrative script.
  • Rodrigo García: Music and Coding.
  • Sebastián Munera: Coding.

The game was designed by all of us :).

NOTE:

Current version has a few of game breaking bugs (because of course it has). We will upload the post-jam version once we are allowed. In the meantime, if you are curious about the game, you can get it in its Github Repository.

SOUND EFFECTS:

The following sound effects were used for this project. The original source is linked below:

  • Run on dart
  • Match Lighting Candle
  • Jump05
  • jump thump
